page.title: 09Life at Stone First School
page.content: At{Stone First School}we have 81 children in the whole school.There are three groups.It is not a very big school.We have three teachers.We do a lot of things,Swimming,Topic,Maths, P.E.,Drama,Games and Sewing.We have Sports Day each summer . We have cards for sports day winners and a cup to give to the winning team. Once a week we have{homework}to do.Sometimes it is hard. One teacher marks the English. We have dinners and sandwhiches. Nearly all the children have{dinners.}We have a Christmas play.We have an Open Evening for all the Mums and Dads to look at our work.We have stories out of the Bible like Noahs ark.We have{trips}in the summer.We go all together or one group at a time.We have{visits;}the "Animal Man",puppet plays and magician [
